name: SpanHome
0:
”Alexa, ask Span what is consuming the most power right now”
”Alexa, ask Span how many hours of battery backup protection do I have”
”Alexa, ask Span how much is my solar generating”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: span
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Span Home Alexa skill gives owners of the Span Smart Panel an intuitive voice-enabled interface to their home energy.

Customers can use Alexa-enabled devices to turn on or off circuits or appliances in their home, find out what energy source is providing power, or discover what appliance is using the most power.

With Span, customers can check on their power usage by asking "Alexa, ask Span what is consuming the most power right now?"

Customers with solar and battery can ask, "Alexa, ask Span how much is my solar generating?" or prep for a potential power outage by asking, "Alexa, ask Span how many hours of battery backup protection do I have?"
